content: the shawl for all - designed by juan the yarn addict suggested materials abbreviations/meanings premier puzzle *4 skeins 328yds/300m ea chain chain total 1312 yards needed 6 mm hook double_crochet double_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet premier basix worsted *4 skeins 359 yds/328m ea skip skip total 1436 yds needed 6 mm hook st s stitch/stitches * yarn suggestions are approximate based on gauge and hook used instructions start by chaining 4 slip st into 1st chain chain 2 does not count as a stitch and will not count throughout the pattern row 1 place 1 double_crochet in the circle chain 1 1 double_crochet chain 1 1 double_crochet chain 1 1 double_crochet chain 1 1 double_crochet chain 2 and turn row 2 1 double_crochet in first st * in chain space place 1 double_crochet chain 1 1 double_crochet 1 double_crochet in next st repeat from * to end of row chain 2 and turn row 3 1 double_crochet in each st until the chain space * in chain space 1 double_crochet chain 1 1 double_crochet then 1 double_crochet in each st until next chain space repeat from * until end of row ending with 1 double_crochet in each st until end of the row chain 2 and turn row 4 1 double_crochet in each st until the chain space * in the chain space 1 double_crochet chain 1 1 double_crochet 1 double_crochet in each stitch until the next chain space repeat from * until end of row ending with 1 double_crochet in each st until the end of the row chain 2 and turn row 5 1 double_crochet in each st until the chain space * in the chain space 1 double_crochet chain 1 1 double_crochet 1 double_crochet in each stitch until the next chain space repeat from * until end of row ending with 1 double_crochet in each st until the end of the row chain 2 and turn row 6 1 double_crochet in each st until the first chain space * in the chain space 1 double_crochet chain 1 1 double_crochet chain 1 skip 1 1 double_crochet in the next st chain 1 skip 1 1 double_crochet continue chaining 1 skipping 1 1 double_crochet until the next chain space be sure to chain 1 before the sts in the chain space repeat from * until the last chain space in chain space 1 double_crochet chain 1 1 double_crochet then 1 double_crochet in each st until the end of the row chain 2 and turn row 7 1 double_crochet in each st until the first chain space * in the chain space 1 double_crochet chain 1 1 double_crochet 1 double_crochet in each window and each st until next chain space repeat from * until last chain space is completed then place 1 double_crochet in each st until the end of the row chain 2 and turn row 8 1 double_crochet in each st until the chain space * in the chain space 1 double_crochet chain 1 1 double_crochet 1 double_crochet in each
